detaileddescription.para: Applies rotary position embeddings to query and key vectors. Used by Llama, SmolLM, and most modern transformer architectures.

Math (Llama-style rotate-half): Split head_dim into two halves (0..half-1, half..head_dim-1). For each position m and index i in [0, half): x0 = x[i], x1 = x[i + half] x'[i] = x0 * cos(m * θ_i) - x1 * sin(m * θ_i) x'[i+half] = x0 * sin(m * θ_i) + x1 * cos(m * θ_i)
Layout: x: [num_heads, num_tokens, head_dim] head-major cos_cache, sin_cache: [max_seq_len, head_dim/2] precomputed

memberdef.argsstring: (float *x, const float *cos_cache, const float *sin_cache, int num_tokens, int head_dim, int aligned_head_dim, int pos_offset)
memberdef.name: rope_apply_head

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *d_out, float *d_x, const float *cos_cache, const float *sin_cache, int num_heads, int num_tokens, int head_dim, int aligned_head_dim, int pos_offset)
memberdef.name: rope_backward

memberdef.argsstring: (float *d_x, const float *cos_cache, const float *sin_cache, int num_heads, int num_tokens, int head_dim, int aligned_head_dim, int pos_offset)
memberdef.name: rope_backward_inplace

memberdef.argsstring: (const float *d_q_out, const float *d_k_out, float *d_q, float *d_k, const float *cos_cache, const float *sin_cache, int num_heads, int num_kv_heads, int num_tokens, int head_dim, int aligned_head_dim, int pos_offset)
memberdef.name: rope_backward_qk

memberdef.argsstring: (float *x, const float *cos_cache, const float *sin_cache, int num_heads, int num_tokens, int head_dim, int aligned_head_dim, int pos_offset)
memberdef.name: rope_forward

memberdef.argsstring: (float *q, float *k, const float *cos_cache, const float *sin_cache, int num_heads, int num_kv_heads, int num_tokens, int head_dim, int aligned_head_dim, int pos_offset)
memberdef.name: rope_forward_qk

memberdef.argsstring: (float *cos_cache, float *sin_cache, int max_seq_len, int head_dim, float base)
memberdef.name: rope_precompute_cache
